ygData.subject: Re: Will not sufficient??
ygData.msgSnippet: You are probably right about my arguements, I only heard them from other players since I never spent much time with one character in EQ. It is kinda hard for
ygData.messageBody:
You are probably right about my arguements, I only heard them from other
players since I never spent much time with one character in EQ. It is kinda
hard for me to play enough, or stay interested enough in EQ to gain serious
levelage. However I do have friends in RL that have been in the beta since
phase two, thats where I got my info. I also love a good arguement, and
although I still don't know who is right (it looks to be you at the moment)
I consider you to have won. I know npc's do hit for more at their level,
but not an incredibly higher amount. And yes, STR does add alot to your
damage when you can do between 1 and say 80. There are other things I know,
from experiences in phase 3 that I saw. 100 damage per swing ISNT ALOT!
Wizards at level 50 can do 1000! YES 1000 damage per spell. That is without
resisting, so a well equiped warrior/fighter hybrid would have a chance, but
still, 100 damage per swing is about how much you can do high in levels.
Rangers at level 20 can do 40 damage with a runed oak bow, and bows only
have half the damage multiplier of weapons. Btw, at level 40 spectres can
be tanked, of course without a healer you will have to sit for a long time
with a bark potion and rubicite plate to heal, but it is possible for the
well equiped fighter to succeed in killing them solo.

Have fun with your Dark Reaver, but I still believe from evidence of your
former posts that you are too low a level to have earned it through the
means a true shadowknight should. Farewell and Goodnight.


All the arguing over EQ have caused me to crave playing it again, perhaps I
will reactivate my account and restart on the path to level 50 :P And still,
I think that it would be very nice for you to show your stats, without that
you have no REAL proof of all your knowledge, and check out eqlizer for
stats on all the weapons btw thats http://www.gameznet.com/eq and you will
see where I have attained most part of my knowledge of the weapons.
